itemDescription: Signature flame-grilled beef patty, topped with tomatoes, lettuce, onions, pickles, and mayonnaise.
Classic burger with a flame-grilled beef patty, cheese, pickles, onions, and ketchup.
Tender chicken patty, lettuce, and mayonnaise, served on a sesame seed bun.
Vegetarian burger with a vegetable patty, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and ketchup.
Crispy and flavorful chicken strips in a fun fries shape, perfect for dipping.
Crispy golden onion rings, served with a tangy dipping sauce.
Creamy soft-serve ice cream cone, available in vanilla or chocolate flavor.
